coreAttributes.name: wooden 'BONK!' bat
coreAttributes.description: A smooth wooden club used to strike a ball as a form of sport. This particular bat has been enchanted to bonk the horny out of people.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat in anticipation of sending some people to horny jail.
coreAttributes.onHitEffect: #IF(npc2.getLust()>0 && npc2.getLust()<=25) [##npc2.setHealth(0)] Having had all of the horny bonked out of [npc2.herHim], [npc2.name] is [style.italicsExcellent(instantly defeated)]! #ENDIF [#npc2.incrementLust(-25, false)]

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bonk)] [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat in an attempt to send [npc2.herHim] straight to horny jail!
Whacking [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as it [npc.she] [npc.verb(bonk)] the horny right out of [npc2.herHim]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(bonk)] [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back and stop being so outrageously horny!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden 'BONK!' bat, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
